subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. Lectotype designated by Clench & Turner (1950) . The record RolÃ¡n & FernÃ¡ndez-GarcÃ©s (2015) from Colombia and Lamy & Pointier (2018) from Guadeloupe are misidentifications of
Cerithiopsis metaxae var. taeniolata Dall, 1889
(M.R. Fernandes pers. com. January 2020 ). RolÃ¡n & FernÃ¡ndez-GarcÃ©s (2007) considered
Cerithiopsis bermudensis Verrill & Bush, 1900 a
possible synonym of
Cerithium rugulosum C.B. Adams, 1850
.
Cerithium vicinum
is considered a junior synonym of
Cerithium rugulosum C.B. Adams, 1850
by RolÃ¡n & FernÃ¡ndez-GarcÃ©s (2007) and Faber (2010) . Various authors reported the name
Metaxia rugulosa G.B. Sowerby, 1850
. However, Sowerby never introduced this name, but only mistakenly recorded the Caribbean
Cerithium rugulosum
from C.B. Adams from European waters (B.A. Marshall, 1977).
